messages.subject: Re: Re: Was The Radical Fringe/ now: next year's conference
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/1/2003 2:59:19 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... I did :) So you can come. Kathryn [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/1/2003 2:59:19 PM Eastern Standard Time,
Unschooling-Discussion@yahoogroups.com writes:

> And please please pretty please plan around the HSC conference in
> Sacramento, if at all possible - I'd love to come to yours - I REALLY
> want to come - but I'd have to give my own state conference first
> priority because my kids will want to go there to see all their friends.
>

I did :)

So you can come.
Kathryn


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
